menu_sections.description: Huge yummy slice of cake
Your taste buds are in for a treat when you check out the sub sandwiches available at a SUBWAY® near you. Learn all about our featured sandwiches and start planning your next meal

menu_items.name: NEW Cauliflower Fritter Curry Signature Wrap
menu_items.description: The new Cauliflower Fritter Curry Signature Wrap is made with a spinach wrap and loaded with our new cauliflower fritters topped with lettuce, onions, green peppers, banana peppers and creamy curry sauce.

menu_items.name: Cripsy Cauliflower Ranch Signature Wrap
menu_items.description: The New Cauliflower Fritter Ranch Signature Wrap starts with a tomato basil wrap filled with our new cauliflower fritters. It's topped with spinach, tomatoes, onions, jalapenos and ranch sauce.

menu_items.name: NEW Chicken Pesto
menu_items.description: The Chicken Pesto Panini starts with fresh mozzarella and savory chicken, topped with spinach and tomatoes. Finished with our new basil pesto and a sprinkle of parmesan cheese, all grilled on ciabatta bread.

menu_items.name: Garlic Steak & Provolone
menu_items.description: The new Garlic Steak & Provolone sandwich takes layers of tender shaved steak topped with a secret Sub Spice Seasoning and stacks it on our delicious New Ciabatta bread. We add provolone, tomatoes, onion, green peppers and finish it with our creamy garlic aioli.

menu_items.name: NEW Caprese
menu_items.description: The Caprese Panini starts with fresh mozzarella, spinach and tomatoes and is topped with our new basil pesto. Finished with a sprinkle of parmesan cheese, and all grilled on ciabatta bread.

menu_items.name: New Southwest Chicken Club
menu_items.description: The new Southwest Chicken Club packs in chicken strips with Applewood Smoked bacon. We then add Pepper Jack cheese, tomatoes, lettuce, green peppers, red onions, Chipotle Southwest sauce, guacamole and toast it in our spicy jalapeno cheddar bread.

menu_items.name: American Club
menu_items.description: The American Club is a delicious combo of turkey breast, Black Forest ham and Applewood Smoked bacon. We top it off with American cheese, lettuce, tomatoes, mayonnaise and fold it up in a tasty toasted Artisan flatbread.

menu_items.name: NEW Classic Italian
menu_items.description: The Classic Italian Panini starts with fresh mozzarella, pepperoni and genoa salami, topped with spinach and tomatoes. Finished with a sprinkle of parmesan cheese, all grilled on ciabatta bread.

menu_items.name: New Sweet N’ Smoky Steak & Guac
menu_items.description: The new Sweet N’ Smoky Steak & Guac Signature Wrap is a combination of flavors you’ve been craving. A double portion of steak, sweet Guajillo Mesquite Sauce and creamy guacamole. All in a tomato basil wrap with jalapeños, veggies, and Monterey cheddar cheese.

menu_items.name: New Chipotle Cheesesteak
menu_items.description: Starting with our new Sunflower Crunch Bread, we stack tender shaved steak and top it with melted Monterey cheddar cheese. Then things get smoky when we finish it with our Chipotle Southwest Sauce.

menu_items.name: BBQ Rib
menu_items.description: Mix things up with the new Subway® BBQ Rib sandwich. Tender pork topped with sweet BBQ Sauce, crisp lettuce, onions and tangy pickles. Try the tasty new BBQ Rib footlong or 6” sub today! *Rib-shaped pork patty.

menu_items.name: NEW Sweet Onion Teriyaki Protein Bowl
menu_items.description: The Sweet Onion Teriyaki Protein Bowl starts with teriyaki-glazed chicken strips piled on top of a bed of shredded lettuce, spinach, tomatoes, cucumbers, green peppers, red onions and topped with our sweet onion sauce.

menu_items.name: NEW Chipotle Southwest Steak Protein Bowl
menu_items.description: The Chipotle Southwest Steak Protein Bowl starts with shaved steak and Monterey cheddar cheese piled on top of a bed of shredded lettuce, tomatoes, red onions, and green peppers, topped with guacamole and Chipotle Southwest sauce.

menu_items.name: NEW Chicken Bacon & Ranch Protein Bowl
menu_items.description: The Chicken Bacon & Ranch Protein Bowl starts with all-white meat chicken strips, bacon, and Monterrey cheddar cheese piled on top of a bed of shredded lettuce, tomatoes, cucumbers, green peppers, red onions and topped with our Ranch Dressing.

menu_items.name: New Steak Club
menu_items.description: The new Steak Club brings layers of shaved steak, turkey breast and Applewood Smoked bacon to the table. Then we add tasty American cheese, crisp lettuce, juicy tomatoes, creamy mayo and toast it up on fresh Italian bread.

menu_items.name: Oven Roasted Chicken
menu_items.description: The Oven Roasted Chicken sandwich is warm, with savory chicken on freshly baked bread with your choice of veggies. Oh, and it's one of eight 6-inch Fresh Fit™ subs with two servings of crisp veggies on freshly baked bread for under 400 calories.

menu_items.name: Veggie Delite®
menu_items.description: The Veggie Delite® sandwich is crispy, crunchy, vegetarian perfection. Pile on the veggies any which way you want! It's one of eight 6-inch Fresh Fit™ subs with two servings of crisp veggies on freshly baked bread for under 400 calories.

menu_items.name: Subway Seafood Sensation™
menu_items.description: Our tasty Subway Seafood Sensation™ is simply delicious on our new Spinach wrap. Topped with a double portion of our seafood blend mixed with mayo and wrapped up with lettuce, tomatoes, cucumbers, green peppers, and red onions, it’s delicious.

menu_items.name: Sweet Onion Chicken Teriyaki
menu_items.description: The Sweet Onion Chicken Teriyaki Signature Wrap is a double portion of tender teriyaki-glazed, all-white meat chicken strips, raised without antibiotics, with seasoning and marinade topped with our fat-free sweet onion sauce. Wrap it up in a tomato basil wrap with lettuce, spinach, tomatoes, cucumbers, green peppers, and red onions. Get ready for a big bite of awesome.

menu_items.name: Spicy Italian
menu_items.description: Feeling spicy? Grab a Spicy Italian Signature Wrap. It's a double portion of spicy pepperoni and Genoa salami on a tomato basil wrap. Topped with lettuce, tomatoes, cucumbers, green peppers and red onions…it's a pretty delicious meal.

menu_items.name: Steak & Cheese
menu_items.description: Our Steak & Cheese Signature Wrap is a double portion of shaved steak, wrapped up with melty American cheese in a tomato basil wrap. Get crazy with veggies and sauces to make it what you want.

menu_items.name: Subway Melt®
menu_items.description: Imagine a Tomato Basil wrap stuffed with a double portion of tender turkey breast, Black Forest ham, crispy bacon, American cheese, and a delicious combination of lettuce, tomatoes, cucumbers, green peppers, and red onions. Now, stop imagining and order it!

menu_items.name: Tuna
menu_items.description: Our tasty Tuna Signature Wrap is completely cravable. It has a double serving of flaked tuna mixed with mayo in a tomato basil wrap. Then it gets topped with any crunchy veggies you want.

menu_items.name: Turkey Breast
menu_items.description: Our Turkey Breast Signature Wrap is a go-to. With a double portion of our premium sliced turkey in a spinach wrap. Made just for you with crunchy veggies and sauces.

menu_items.name: Turkey Breast & Black Forest Ham
menu_items.description: Take a bite of this Spinach wrap filled with a double portion of our tender turkey breast and tasty Black Forest ham. Top it with lettuce, spinach, tomatoes, cucumbers, green peppers, and red onions. It’s simply delicious.

menu_items.name: Turkey Italiano Signature Wrap
menu_items.description: The Turkey Italiano Signature Wrap is all about the meat. First, we load a double portion of tender turkey breast, Genoa salami and spicy pepperoni on a spinach wrap. Then we finish this Italian masterpiece with Provolone cheese, veggies, and a burst of zesty Subway® vinaigrette.

menu_items.name: Veggie Delite®
menu_items.description: The Veggie Delite® Signature Wrap has a double portion of the fresh veggies you love. All wrapped in a flavorful spinach wrap with lettuce, tomatoes, spinach, green peppers, cucumbers, and red onions. It's one bold, crunchy flavor combo.

menu_items.name: Veggie Patty
menu_items.description: What’s better than a Spinach wrap filled with not one, but two of our flavor packed Veggie Patties, lettuce, spinach, tomatoes, cucumbers, green peppers, and red onions.

menu_items.name: Turkey, Bacon & Guacamole
menu_items.description: The name says it all. A delicious tomato basil wrap filled with a double portion of our premium sliced turkey breast and smoky applewood bacon. And then topped with provolone cheese, guacamole, lettuce, tomatoes, red onions, and ranch sauce.

menu_items.name: Chipotle Southwest Steak & Cheese
menu_items.description: Saddle up with this delicious tomato basil wrap jam-packed with a double portion of steak and topped with your favorite Tex-Mex flavors like Monterey cheddar, guacamole, jalapenos, lettuce, tomatoes, red onion, green peppers and Chipotle Southwest sauce.

menu_sections.description: It's easy to make better choices every day with the SUBWAY® Fresh Fit sandwiches. View our Fresh Fit menu online to find lots of delicious sandwiches, all packed with flavor!

menu_items.name: Fresh Fit Crispy Chicken
menu_items.description: Finally you can enjoy an amazing crispy chicken sandwich that you and your taste buds can feel good about. The chicken in our New Fresh Fit® Crispy Chicken Sandwich is juicy on the inside and perfectly crispy on the outside. It’s served on fresh-baked 9 grain bread and topped with lettuce, spinach, tomatoes, cucumbers, onions and green peppers.

menu_items.name: Turkey Breast
menu_items.description: If a classic is what you crave, then our oven roasted Turkey Breast is the sandwich for you. It’s full of flavor and packed with protein. Made-to-order with your choice of crisp veggies, served on our freshly baked bread.

menu_items.name: Oven Roasted Chicken
menu_items.description: The Oven Roasted Chicken sandwich is warm, with savory chicken on freshly baked bread with your choice of veggies. Oh, and it's one of eight 6-inch Fresh Fit™ subs with two servings of crisp veggies on freshly baked bread for under 400 calories.

menu_items.name: Sweet Onion Chicken Teriyaki
menu_items.description: Our Sweet Onion Chicken Teriyaki sandwich is stuffed with teriyaki-glazed chicken strips topped with our own fat-free sweet onion sauce. All that, and it's one of eight 6-inch Fresh Fit™ subs with two servings of crisp veggies on freshly baked bread for under 400 calories.

menu_items.name: Black Forest Ham
menu_items.description: Black Forest Ham sandwich is classic. Just add your own flavor. Oh, and it's one of eight six-inch Fresh Fit™ subs with two servings of crisp veggies on freshly baked bread for under 400 calories.

menu_items.name: Veggie Delite®
menu_items.description: The Veggie Delite® sandwich is crispy, crunchy, vegetarian perfection. Pile on the veggies any which way you want! It's one of eight 6-inch Fresh Fit™ subs with two servings of crisp veggies on freshly baked bread for under 400 calories.

menu_items.name: Coca Cola Zero

menu_items.name: vitaminwater XXX
menu_items.description: How about pairing your sub with something refreshing? Try vitaminwater xxx, our newest fountain drink infused with vitamins B5, B6, B12 and E.

menu_items.name: Simply Lemonade®
menu_items.description: Treat yourself to a refreshing drink with simple ingredients you can recognize, with Simply Lemonade®, new at SUBWAY®. With no added preservatives or artificial flavors and a delicious, fresh squeezed taste not from concentrate, Simply Lemonade® is the perfect pairing with any of your favorite subs.

menu_items.description: There’s a new flavor at SUBWAY® Restaurants: vitaminwater zero™ rise. The naturally sweetened, great-tasting, zero-calorie water beverage that’s enhanced with added nutrients and an excellent source of C & B vitamins. You’re taste buds will love it! menu_items.name: Subway Fresh Brewed Tea
menu_items.description: Refresh yourself with Subway’s fresh brewed iced tea, crafted by Gold Peak. Real fresh brewed tea with a taste that brings you home and only available at SUBWAY®.

menu_items.name: Simply Apple®
menu_items.description: Treat yourself to the crisp, cold, and irresistible Simply Apple®. Made with 100% pure-pressed apple juice, Simply Apple® makes the perfect refreshing drink to pair with one of your favorite subs.

menu_items.name: Simply Orange®
menu_items.description: Treat yourself in the morning to refreshing Simply Orange®. Build your own breakfast sandwich and pair it with never sweetened or concentrated Simply Orange® to really get your morning started!

menu_items.name: New Little Cheesesteak Slider
menu_items.description: The Little Cheesesteak packs BIG flavor. Handcrafted on a telera slider roll, we top it with tender shaved steak, American cheese, green peppers, red onions and zesty Chipotle Southwest sauce.

menu_items.name: New Little Turkey Slider
menu_items.description: The Little Turkey is everything you love in a more cravable size. Made by hand on a telera slider roll, we combine our delicious turkey breast with savory pepper jack cheese. Then top it with spinach and mayo for good measure.

menu_items.name: New Italian Spice Slider
menu_items.description: The Italian Spice delivers huge flavor in a smaller size. Crafted on a telera slider roll, we add pepperoni, salami and American cheese for the perfect flavor experience. It's not complete without our classic Subway® vinaigrette.

menu_items.name: New Ham & Jack Slider
menu_items.description: The Ham & Jack delivers the flavors you crave in a smaller size. We start with a delicious telera slider roll then combine savory Black Forest Ham with pepper jack cheese for the ultimate flavor experience.

menu_items.name: Meatball Marinara
menu_items.description: The Meatball Marinara sandwich is drenched in irresistible marinara sauce, sprinkled with Parmesan cheese, topped with whatever you want (no judgement) and perfectly toasted just for you.

menu_items.name: Cold Cut Combo
menu_items.description: The Cold Cut Combo sandwich with ham, salami, and bologna (all turkey based) is a long-time Subway® favorite. Yeah. It's that good.

menu_items.name: Cheese Flatizza
menu_items.description: It's an exciting combination of warm marinara sauce and bubbly mozzarella cheese on a toasty flatbread.

menu_items.name: Pepperoni Flatizza
menu_items.description: Crispy flatbread crust. Mouthwatering marinara sauce. Bubbly shredded mozzarella cheese. Spicy pepperoni. Make it your own by adding your favorite veggies.

menu_items.name: Spicy Italian Flatizza
menu_items.description: Our signature crispy flatbread crust. Mouthwatering marinara sauce. Bubbly mozzarella. Topped with savory salami and spicy pepperoni.

menu_items.name: Veggie Flatizza
menu_items.description: This Flatizza is a crispy, light flatbread, topped with veggies. All those tomatoes, green peppers, olives and onions complement the mouthwatering marinara sauce and melted mozzarella cheese. Irresistible to the last bite.

menu_items.name: Personal Cheese Pizza
menu_items.description: Our pizza dough is covered with mouthwatering marinara sauce then topped with shredded mozzarella cheese. Make it yours by adding your favorite veggies. We make it amazing by baking it to personal perfection.

menu_sections.description: Start your day the right way with SUBWAY® breakfast sandwiches. Browse all our breakfast options, including egg white sandwiches on flatbread, and don't forget spinach and other favorite toppings!

menu_items.name: Sausage Egg & Cheese
menu_items.description: Rise and shine with this breakfast classic. A fluffy omelet topped with savory sausage and melted American cheese.

menu_items.name: Bacon, Egg & Cheese
menu_items.description: Start your day in a sizzlin' way with a Tomato Basil wrap filled with American Cheese and a double portion of delicious egg omelets and crispy bacon.

menu_items.name: Black Forest Ham, Egg & Cheese
menu_items.description: Helllooo delicious! Enjoy a Spinach wrap filled with American cheese and a double portion of savory Black Forest ham and egg omelets. What a tasty way to start the day!

menu_items.name: Egg & Cheese
menu_items.description: A classic for a reason, now available on a Spinach wrap. Enjoy with American Cheese and a double portion of fluffy egg omelets.

menu_items.name: Steak, Egg & Cheese
menu_items.description: No matter what side of the bed you wake up on, you'll love this. Enjoy American cheese and a double portion of egg omelets and tender shaved steak on a delicious Tomato Basil wrap. Oh, what a beautiful breakfast.

menu_items.name: Black Forest Ham, Egg & Cheese
menu_items.description: Enjoy savory Black Forest ham, melted cheese, and egg - all on your favorite bread. Add your choice of veggies for a tasty way to start the day. Hello, delicious.

menu_items.name: Bacon, Egg & Cheese
menu_items.description: Start your day in a sizzlin' way with bacon, egg, and melty cheese on freshly toasted flatbread (or whatever you like). Pile on your favorite veggies and sauce. Start the day right.

menu_items.name: Western Egg & Cheese
menu_items.description: The Western Egg & Cheese is the Featured $5 FOOTLONG™ of July! It’s fresh toasted with Black Forest Ham, peppers, onions, and melty cheese on tasty flatbread, and available all day this July only!

menu_items.name: Steak, Egg & Cheese
menu_items.description: No matter what side of the bed you wake up on, you’ll love this. Yummy egg with tender and delicious steak covered in melty cheese. That's one beautiful breakfast.

menu_items.name: Egg & Cheese
menu_items.description: A classic for a reason. Our Egg and Cheese is simply delicious. Enjoy a fluffy egg omelet with melted cheese. Try it toasted - It's unbeatable.

menu_items.name: Breakfast B.M.T.® Melt
menu_items.description: Fluffy egg, Black Forest ham, salami and spicy pepperoni come together with bubbly melted cheese for a morning masterpiece worthy of the breakfast hall of fame. Try it today on tasty flatbread with all your favorite crisp veggies.

menu_sections.description: Fresh Fit for Kids

menu_items.name: Veggie Delite® Mini for Kids
menu_items.description: Got a kid who loves vegetables above all else? Our Veggie Delite® kids meal piles all their favorites on freshly baked bread. Apple slices and a choice of an ice-cold bottle of low fat milk or Honest Kids’® Fruit Punch make this better-for-you meal a star.

menu_items.name: Black Forest Ham Mini for Kids
menu_items.description: Every kid likes to ham it up once in a while. That’s why they’ll love the taste of our Black Forest ham and their favorite veggies on freshly baked bread. Apple slices and a choice of an ice-cold bottle of low fat milk or Honest Kids’® Fruit Punch make this better-for-you meal a star.

menu_items.name: Turkey Breast Mini for Kids
menu_items.description: Kids love the taste of tender turkey breast, freshly baked bread and their favorite veggies. Apple slices and a choice of an ice-cold bottle of low fat milk or Honest Kids’® Fruit Punch make this better-for-you meal a star.

menu_sections.description: Each sandwich on the SUBWAY® menu was carefully crafted for maximum flavor. Discover all of our tasty subs and melts, piled with all your favorite meats, cheeses, sauces, and vegetables.

menu_items.name: NEW Carne Asada Cheesesteak
menu_items.description: Try our spin on a classic cheesesteak! The Carne Asada Cheesesteak starts with Jalapeno Cheddar bread and is topped with shaved steak. Then we kick it up a knotch with pepper jack cheese, roasted chiles & onions, jalapenos, creamy guacamole, lettuce, tomatoes and salsa verde.

menu_items.name: Double Provolone Cheesesteak
menu_items.description: The classic sandwich you love now made with extra cheese! Our Double Provolone Cheesesteak starts with freshly baked bread and is topped with shaved steak, green peppers, onions, lettuce, tomatoes, mayo and a double portion of provolone.

menu_items.name: Genoa Salami
menu_items.description: Slices of Genoa Salami layered onto freshly baked Italian Bread, then piled high with your favorite veggies, like lettuce, tomatoes, cucumbers, green peppers and zesty red onions.

menu_items.name: Chicken Mango Curry
menu_items.description: Mango curry covered chicken with layers of onion, tomato and cucumber under a spread of bright cilantro chutney on fresh baked Italian bread.

menu_items.name: Chicken Tikka
menu_items.description: Creamy Tikka Masala covered chicken with layers of onion, tomato and cucumber under a spread of bright cilantro chutney on fresh baked Italian bread.

menu_items.name: Chicken Vindaloo
menu_items.description: Spicy Vindaloo covered chicken with layers of onion, tomato and cucumber under a spread of bright cilantro chutney on fresh baked Italian bread.

menu_items.name: Paneer Tikka
menu_items.description: Paneer cheese covered in a creamy Tikka Masala with layers of spinach, tomato and cucumber under a spread of bright cilantro chutney on fresh baked Italian bread.

menu_items.name: Garlic Steak & Provolone
menu_items.description: The new Garlic Steak & Provolone sandwich takes layers of tender shaved steak topped with a secret Sub Spice Seasoning and stacks it on our delicious New Ciabatta bread. We add provolone, tomatoes, onion, green peppers and finish it with our creamy garlic aioli.

menu_items.name: New Southwest Chicken Club
menu_items.description: The new Southwest Chicken Club packs in chicken strips with Applewood Smoked bacon. We then add Pepper Jack cheese, tomatoes, lettuce, green peppers, red onions, Chipotle Southwest sauce, guacamole and toast it in our spicy jalapeno cheddar bread.

menu_items.name: American Club
menu_items.description: The American Club is a delicious combo of turkey breast, Black Forest ham and Applewood Smoked bacon. We top it off with American cheese, lettuce, tomatoes, mayonnaise and fold it up in a tasty toasted Artisan flatbread.

menu_items.name: Veggie Patty
menu_items.description: Delicious veggie patties served on fresh 9-Grain Wheat bread. Top it with fresh lettuce, baby spinach, tomatoes, cucumbers, green peppers and red onions.

menu_items.name: Green Chile Steak
menu_items.description: Green Chile Steak

menu_items.name: Mediterranean Steak
menu_items.description: A Greek style flavor adventure. Toasty flatbread, piled high with steak, feta cheese, and fresh veggies. The finishing touch? Creamy Tzatziki sauce.

menu_items.name: Harvest Turkey & Ham
menu_items.description: Savory and meaty with a little bit of crunch, the New Harvest Turkey and Ham starts with our New Sunflower Crunch bread and gets piled high with turkey and Black Forest ham. Then it’s topped with provolone, spinach, tomatoes, red onions, and creamy Dijon aioli.

menu_items.name: New Chipotle Cheesesteak
menu_items.description: Starting with our new Sunflower Crunch Bread, we stack tender shaved steak and top it with melted Monterey cheddar cheese. Then things get smoky when we finish it with our Chipotle Southwest Sauce.

menu_items.name: BBQ Rib
menu_items.description: Mix things up with the new Subway® BBQ Rib sandwich. Tender pork topped with sweet BBQ Sauce, crisp lettuce, onions and tangy pickles. Try the tasty new BBQ Rib footlong or 6” sub today! *Rib-shaped pork patty.

menu_items.name: Homestyle Crispy Chicken
menu_items.description: Meet the chicken sandwich your taste buds have been waiting for. The New Homestyle Crispy Chicken Sandwich starts with chicken that’s juicy on the inside and perfectly crispy on the outside. Then we pack it into fresh-baked Italian bread and pair it with American, pickle chips and our new smoky honey mustard.

menu_items.name: Fresh Fit Crispy Chicken
menu_items.description: Finally you can enjoy an amazing crispy chicken sandwich that you and your taste buds can feel good about. The chicken in our New Fresh Fit® Crispy Chicken Sandwich is juicy on the inside and perfectly crispy on the outside. It’s served on fresh-baked 9 grain bread and topped with lettuce, spinach, tomatoes, cucumbers, onions and green peppers.

menu_items.description: Fresh Fit Crispy Chicken

menu_items.name: Orchard Chicken
menu_items.description: Orchard Chicken

menu_items.name: Corned Beef Reuben
menu_items.description: You cannot describe the delicousness of the Reuben with savory corned beef, traditional sauerkraut, creamy Thousand Island dressing and swiss cheese on toasted rye bread. Or maybe you can. For a limited time.

menu_items.name: Turkey Reuben
menu_items.description: A delicious twist on the classic reuben. The twist? Swap the corned beef with a hearty, double-meat portion of oven roasted turkey breast. Enjoy it with traditional sauerkraut, creamy Thousand Island dressing, and melted Swiss cheese on freshly-baked Rye Bread.

menu_items.name: Autumn Carved Turkey
menu_items.description: The Autumn Carved Turkey with thick-cut turkey breast, sweet and tangy cranberry mustard sauce and cheddar cheese. Like Thanksgiving but too delicious for leftovers. Happy Tastegiving! Limited time only.

menu_items.name: Italian Hero
menu_items.description: Spicy Capicola, Mortadella, and Genoa Salami topped with provolone, oil and red wine vinegar, and Mediterranean oregano on Italian Bread. Try this hearty sub packed with authentic Italian flavor, only for a limited time!

menu_items.name: Chicken Caesar Melt
menu_items.description: All hail flavorful strips of chicken, topped with melty provolone cheese, tender spinach, tomatoes and onions, drizzled with creamy Caesar sauce, served on Italian bread.

menu_items.name: Turkey & Bacon Avocado
menu_items.description: Freshly baked Italian bread, meet delicious turkey breast, bacon and creamy avocado. Top it with your favorite veggies.

menu_items.name: Cubano Pulled Pork
menu_items.description: Cubano Pulled Pork

menu_items.name: New Steak Club
menu_items.description: The new Steak Club brings layers of shaved steak, turkey breast and Applewood Smoked bacon to the table. Then we add tasty American cheese, crisp lettuce, juicy tomatoes, creamy mayo and toast it up on fresh Italian bread.

menu_items.name: Subway Seafood Sensation
menu_items.description: Treat your senses to a mouthwatering blend of seafood and mayo on freshly baked Italian bread, topped with your favorite veggies. Don't let this catch get away. (Subway Seafood Sensation™ is a processed seafood and crab blend.)

menu_items.name: Egg Salad Sandwich
menu_items.description: Our egg salad is simply delicious. We take hard boiled eggs, whip them with creamy mayonnaise, then spread it on freshly baked Italian bread. Top it with lettuce, tomatoes, crispy cucumbers, green peppers, and tangy red onions.

menu_items.name: Spring Garden Chicken
menu_items.description: Spring Garden Chicken

menu_items.name: Turkey & Bacon Guacamole
menu_items.description: Tender turkey and bacon layered on 9 grain wheat bread, topped with our creamy Guacamole. Really live it up by adding your choice of fresh veggies.

menu_items.name: Turkey Breast
menu_items.description: If a classic is what you crave, then our oven roasted Turkey Breast is the sandwich for you. It’s full of flavor and packed with protein. Made-to-order with your choice of crisp veggies, served on our freshly baked bread.

menu_items.name: Turkey Breast & Black Forest Ham
menu_items.description: A sandwich so deliciously hearty, you won't know you're eating low fat. Enjoy the flavor of tender sliced turkey breast and Black Forest ham with your favorite veggies from juicy tomatoes to sweet red onions served on your favorite freshly baked bread.

menu_items.name: Oven Roasted Chicken
menu_items.description: The Oven Roasted Chicken sandwich is warm, with savory chicken on freshly baked bread with your choice of veggies. Oh, and it's one of eight 6-inch Fresh Fit™ subs with two servings of crisp veggies on freshly baked bread for under 400 calories.

menu_items.name: Sweet Onion Chicken Teriyaki
menu_items.description: Our Sweet Onion Chicken Teriyaki sandwich is stuffed with teriyaki-glazed chicken strips topped with our own fat-free sweet onion sauce. All that, and it's one of eight 6-inch Fresh Fit™ subs with two servings of crisp veggies on freshly baked bread for under 400 calories.

menu_items.name: Black Forest Ham
menu_items.description: Black Forest Ham sandwich is classic. Just add your own flavor. Oh, and it's one of eight six-inch Fresh Fit™ subs with two servings of crisp veggies on freshly baked bread for under 400 calories.

menu_items.name: Meatball Marinara
menu_items.description: The Meatball Marinara sandwich is drenched in irresistible marinara sauce, sprinkled with Parmesan cheese, topped with whatever you want (no judgement) and perfectly toasted just for you.

menu_items.name: Italian B.M.T.®
menu_items.description: The Italian B.M.T.® sandwich is filled with Genoa salami, spicy pepperoni, and Black Forest Ham. Big. Meaty. Tasty. Get it.

menu_items.name: The Big Philly Cheesesteak
menu_items.description: The Big Philly Cheesesteak is every meat lover's dream. With lots of steak smothered in melted cheese, it's easy to see why this classic is the taste that Philly is so proud of.

menu_items.name: Subway Melt®
menu_items.description: Imagine freshly baked bread stuffed with tender sliced turkey breast, Black Forest Ham, crispy bacon, melted cheese, and your choice of tasty vegetables and condiments. Now, stop imagining and get your mouth over to your nearest SUBWAY® Restaurant.

menu_items.name: Classic Tuna
menu_items.description: You’ll love every bite of our classic tuna sandwich. Flaked tuna blended with creamy mayo then topped with your choice of crisp, fresh veggies. Served on our freshly baked bread.

menu_items.name: Veggie Delite®
menu_items.description: The Veggie Delite® sandwich is crispy, crunchy, vegetarian perfection. Pile on the veggies any which way you want! It's one of eight 6-inch Fresh Fit™ subs with two servings of crisp veggies on freshly baked bread for under 400 calories.

menu_items.name: Cold Cut Combo
menu_items.description: The Cold Cut Combo sandwich with ham, salami, and bologna (all turkey based) is a long-time Subway® favorite. Yeah. It's that good.

menu_items.name: Chicken & Bacon Ranch Melt
menu_items.description: The Chicken & Bacon Ranch Melt sandwich is packed with tender all-white meat chicken with seasoning and marinade, savory bacon, melty Montery cheddar cheese…and toasted. Aw yeah.

menu_items.name: Spicy Italian
menu_items.description: Our Spicy Italian sandwich is a combo of pepperoni and Genoa salami. Pile on cheese, crunchy veggies, and finish it with your favorite sauce. Or don't. Your call.

menu_items.name: Buffalo Chicken
menu_items.description: You might wonder how something could taste this incredible. But when you bite into a sandwich this tender, juicy and irresistibly bold, the only thing you need to question is how soon is too soon to have another.

menu_items.name: B.L.T.
menu_items.description: The sub that proves great things come in threes. In this case, those three things happen to be crisp bacon, lettuce and juicy tomato. While there’s no scientific way of proving it, this B.L.T might be the most perfect sub in existence.

menu_items.name: NEW Sriracha Chicken Melt
menu_items.description: Melty pepperjack cheese over tender chicken with fiery Sriracha Sauce. Chicken just got bold.

menu_items.name: Steak & Cheese
menu_items.description: Our Steak & Cheese sandwich is where warm, delicious steak gets topped with melty cheesiness. Get crazy with veggies and sauces to make it what you want.

menu_items.name: Sunrise Subway Melt®
menu_items.description: Rise and shine to a delightfully delicious breakfast of tender turkey, crispy bacon, Black Forest ham and fluffy egg white under a blanket of bubbly melted cheese. Try one today on hot toasted flatbread with your choice of tasty veggies.

menu_items.name: Oven Crisp Chicken
menu_items.description: Experience the breakthrough taste of the NEW Oven Crisp Chicken for some deep flavor without the deep fryer. It's NEVER fried, NEVER greasy and ALWAYS tasty. As a 6-inch sub, it's a delicious part of a SUBWAY FRESH FIT® meal. Try one today, because grease is out. Fresh taste is in.

menu_items.name: Chicken Marinara Melt
menu_items.description: Tender chicken breast covered in our signature marinara sauce, with plenty of melty cheese. All served fresh-toasted on Italian bread. Get it now as a $5 Footlong(tm) sub, this November only!

menu_items.name: Turkey B.L.T
menu_items.description: Just when you thought our tender turkey sandwich couldn’t get any better, we take it to the next level and load it with crispalicious bacon! And get this – even with a bounty of bacon, this fresh twist on turkey has just 7 grams of fat.

menu_items.name: Turkey Jalapeno Melt
menu_items.description: If your New Year’s resolution was to get wild, then this boldacious number will be right up your alley. Treat your taste buds to a flavor explosion of tender turkey and bubbly, melted cheese, amped up with kickin’ jalapeños and Chipotle Southwest sauce.

menu_items.name: Chicken Pizziola® Melt
menu_items.description: Our fresh take on Italian. Juicy chicken, zest-errific pepperoni, and our signature recipe marinara sauce toasted with melty cheese on your favorite freshly baked bread. Molto buona!

menu_items.name: Chicken Parmesan
menu_items.description: An Italian classic with a SUBWAY® twist. Tender, juicy chicken and our signature recipe marinara sauce. All fresh toasted with lots of melty cheese. Mangia-licious!

menu_items.name: Smokehouse BBQ Chicken
menu_items.description: This limited time SUBWAY FRESH FIT® sub is big on flavor, not fat. Enjoy tender, pulled chicken smothered in smoky BBQ sauce on your freshly baked bread. It’s also a $6 FOOTLONG™ Special!

menu_items.name: Applewood Pulled Pork
menu_items.description: Get a taste of tender pulled pork, slow-cooked and covered in rich barbecue sauce with that sweet, smoky flavor you can’t get enough of. Try it on your favorite freshly baked bread, piled high with red onions, tangy pickles or whatever you like.

menu_items.name: Ultimate Veggie
menu_items.description: Super foods avocado and spinach put the Ultimate in the Ultimate Veggie. Enjoy your favorite freshly baked bread piled high with the fresh veggies you’ll only find here or even creamy avocado and fresh baby spinach.

menu_items.name: BBQ Oven Roasted Chicken Melt
menu_items.description: Our BBQ Oven Roasted Chicken Melt is topped with Monterey Cheddar, tangy pickles and barbecue sauce with a slightly spicy finish. Get it made the way you say with your favorite toppings on our freshly baked bread!

menu_items.name: Steak and Bacon Melt
menu_items.description: Two of your favorites on one melt. The Steak & Bacon Melt is piled high with mountains of tender juicy steak and crispy bacon, smothered in bubbly melted cheese. What’s not to love?

menu_items.name: Pizza Sub
menu_items.description: Hot outta the oven, it’s the Pizza Sub. Enjoy spicy pepperoni, piled high and layered with melt-a-licious cheese and our signature marinara sauce. Try it on freshly baked Italian Herb & Cheese bread today, because this May only, it joins our many $5 FOOTLONGS™.

menu_items.name: Chipotle Steak and Cheese
menu_items.description: We took a SUBWAY® classic and kicked it up a notch. The smokey Chipotle Steak and Cheese features tender, juicy steak with bubbly, melted cheese, all topped off with our Chipotle Southwest sauce.

menu_items.name: Chicken Cordon Bleu Melt
menu_items.description: Warm, rotisserie-style chicken, Black Forest Ham, and Swiss cheese, tossed with lettuce, spinach, tomatoes, green peppers, onions, and black olives, and topped with Honey Mustard.

menu_items.name: NEW Fritos® Chicken Enchilada Melt
menu_items.description: There's never been another sub like it! Crunch into a pile of Fritos placed right on top of tender pulled chicken and authentic enchilada sauce for a new satisfyingly delicious bite of flavor you can't find anywhere else!

menu_items.name: BBQ Steak and Bacon Melt
menu_items.description: A mountain of juicy steak with peaks of crispy bacon and cascades of sweet and smoky barbecue sauce all under a velvety soft blanket of melted cheese. This masterpiece sits beautifully atop freshly baked bread – a feast for the eyes as well as the mouth.

menu_items.name: NEW Sriracha Steak Melt
menu_items.description: Tender shaved steak covered in pepperjack cheese with fiery Sriracha Sauce. How’s that for bold?

menu_items.name: Turkey Italiano Melt
menu_items.description: Tender turkey breast, oven-roasted to perfection. With genoa salami, spicy pepperoni, melty provolone and tangy NEW SUBWAY® Vinaigrette. All on freshly baked bread and with your favorite veggies to make it a sandwich like no other.

menu_items.name: Turkey & Bacon Guacamole
menu_items.description: Tender Turkey Breast, crispy bacon and rich guacamole, made with a little kick of jalapenos, onion and garlic. Try it with fresh veggies like cucumbers, green peppers and red onions all on freshly toasted Italian Bread.

menu_items.name: Big Hot Pastrami Melt
menu_items.description: A monument to flavor loaded with cuts of dry-rubbed, pepper-crusted beef and melted cheese on freshly baked bread. Enjoy yours with mustard and pickles.

menu_items.name: Carved Turkey
menu_items.description: It’s tender. It’s juicy. It’s our NEW premium, thick-cut Carved Turkey served on freshly baked bread. Featuring all white meat, no artificial preservatives, and classic oven roasted flavor. Enjoy as is, or top off your sub with any of our fresh veggies.

menu_items.name: Carved Turkey with Bacon
menu_items.description: It’s tender. It’s juicy. It’s our NEW premium, thick-cut Carved Turkey served on freshly baked bread. Featuring all white meat, no artificial preservatives, and classic oven roasted flavor. Try it with melted cheese, crisp veggies, and topped with Applewood smoked bacon.

menu_items.name: Reduced-Fat Turkey Bacon & Cage Free Egg White Sandwich
menu_items.description: Sizzling reduced-fat turkey bacon and wholesome cage-free egg whites are paired with the rich creaminess of melted, reduced-fat white cheddar cheese on an organic wheat English muffin.

menu_items.name: Spicy Chorizo, Monterey Jack & Egg Breakfast Sandwich
menu_items.description: Spicy chorizo, Monterey jack cheese, egg and caramelized onions. Served on potato bread.

menu_items.name: Spinach, Feta & Cage-Free Egg White Breakfast Wrap
menu_items.description: Cage-free egg whites, spinach, feta cheese and tomatoes. Served in a whole wheat wrap.

menu_items.name: Double-Smoked Bacon, Cheddar & Egg Sandwich
menu_items.description: Thick-cut bacon, egg patty and cheddar cheese. Served on a croissant.

menu_items.name: Sausage, Cheddar & Egg Breakfast Sandwich
menu_items.description: Sausage patty, eggs and aged cheddar cheese served on an English muffin.

menu_items.name: Chicken Sausage & Bacon Biscuit
menu_items.description: Our baked-from-scratch cornmeal biscuit is the base of this sandwich and it gets even better from there with chicken sausage, double-smoked bacon, country-style gravy and spiced honey butter. Our chickens are raised without use of antibiotics.

menu_items.name: Roasted Ham, Swiss & Egg Sandwich
menu_items.description: Take hickory smoked ham and nutty melty Swiss cheese layered on a flaky, buttery croissant and you've got the perfect wake up call.

menu_items.name: Avocado Spread
menu_items.description: Spruce up your sandwich or Sous Vide egg bites with avocado mixed with a touch of spices and lime. And just like our evolution fresh juices, our avocado spread is made using a high-pressure process designed to help maintain freshness without the use of heat, additives or preservatives.

menu_items.name: Sous Vide Egg Bites: Bacon & Gruyere
menu_items.description: A foodie delight, even when you're on-the-go. We've taken cage-free eggs and prepared them using the French 'sous vide' technique resulting in a velvety texture that's bursting with flavor. We added aged Gruyere and Monterey Jack cheese, and topped them with Applewood smoked bacon for a delicious, high protein, convenient breakfast.

menu_items.name: Sous Vide Egg Bites: Egg White & Red Pepper
menu_items.description: Perfectly cooked, cage-free eggs whites are prepared using the French 'sous vide' technique resulting in a velvety texture that's bursting with flavor. We added creamy monterey jack cheese, plus spinach and fire-roasted red peppers for a high protein breakfast that's both delicious and convenient.

menu_items.name: Sous Vide Egg Bites: Chicken Chorizo Tortilla
menu_items.description: Our perfectly cooked, cage-free sous vide egg bites include chicken chorizo, chipotle salsa and cotija cheese, with corn tortilla pieces resting atop. It's a full-flavored breakfast masterfully packed into each savory, portable bite.

menu_items.name: Sous Vide Egg Bites: Ham, Cheddar & Peppers
menu_items.description: Diced ham with roasted red and green peppers, inspired by the classic Denver omelet.

menu_items.name: Hearty Blueberry Oatmeal
menu_items.description: Blend of rolled and steel-cut oats with blueberries and agave syrup.

menu_items.name: Classic Oatmeal
menu_items.description: Blend of rolled and steel-cut oats, served with dried fruit a nut medley and brown sugar if you choose.

menu_items.name: Sprouted Grain Vegan Bagel
menu_items.description: This vegan bagel is the traditional texture everyone loves. The flavorful aged bagel dough is made with wholesome sprouted wheat and rye, then topped with brown and golden flax, oats and sunflower seeds. Delicious on its own, even better finished with your favorite spread. The sprouted grain bagel joins Starbucks's current assortment of certified vegan bagels, including our plain, raisin and blueberry bagels.

menu_items.name: Everything Bagel
menu_items.description: Get your morning started with a pop of flavor. Our signature New York?style bagel is topped with onion, garlic, salt, poppy seeds and sesame seeds.

menu_items.name: Cinnamon Raisin Bagel
menu_items.description: Our New York-style boiled bagel gets sweet cinnamon swirled into the dough, just before heaps of raisins are mixed in. Add a little sweet to your savory breakfast.

menu_items.name: Plain Bagel
menu_items.description: Our classic soft, chewy and thick New York-style bagel. Enjoy it toasted or not, and with a smear of cream cheese or not.

menu_items.name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Cake Pop
menu_items.description: Who doesn't love chocolate chip cookie dough. Now you can enjoy it as a cake pop complete with chocolate chips on top.

menu_items.name: Birthday Cake Pop

menu_items.name: Iced Lemon Pound Cake
menu_items.description: A moist lemon cake with sweet icing.

menu_items.name: Classic Coffee Cake

menu_items.name: Chocolate Cake Pop
menu_items.description: Chocolate cake mixed with chocolate butter cream, dipped in dark chocolate and topped with sugar sprinkles.

menu_items.name: Lemon Cake Pop

menu_items.name: Double Chocolate Chunk Brownie
menu_items.description: Rich chocolate brownie with premium cocoa and generous chunks of chocolate.

menu_items.name: Chocolate Chip Cookie

menu_items.name: Old-Fashioned Glazed Doughnut

menu_items.name: Coffee Frappuccino

menu_items.name: Espresso Frappuccino
menu_items.description: Coffee is combined with a shot of espresso and milk, then blended with ice to give you a nice little jolt and lots of sipping joy.

menu_items.name: Caffe Vanilla Frappuccino
menu_items.description: We take frappuccino roast coffee and vanilla bean powder, combine them with milk and ice, then top it with whipped cream. Tastes like happiness.

menu_items.name: White Chocolate Mocha Frappuccino
menu_items.description: White chocolate frappuccino roast coffee, milk and ice get together for what might be the best thing that happens to you all day. Oh and there's whipped cream on top.

menu_items.name: Ultra Caramel Frappuccino
menu_items.description: Dark caramel coffee Frappuccino is enveloped between layers of whipped cream that's infused with cold brew, white chocolate and dark caramel. And on each layer of whipped cream sits a dollop of dark caramel sauce. These layers ensure each sip is as good as the last all the way to the end.

menu_items.name: Caramel Frappuccino
menu_items.description: Buttery caramel syrup meets coffee, milk and ice for a rendezvous in the blender. Then whipped cream and caramel sauce layer the love on top. To change things up, try it affogato-style by adding an affogato-style shot a hot espresso shot poured right over the top.

menu_items.name: Vanilla Bean Creme Frappuccino
menu_items.description: This rich and creamy blend of vanilla bean, milk and ice topped with whipped cream takes va-va-vanilla flavor to another level. To change things up, try it affogato-style by adding an affogato-style shot: a hot espresso shot poured right over the top.

menu_items.name: Double Chocolaty Chip Creme Frappuccino
menu_items.description: Rich mocha-flavored sauce meets up with chocolaty chips, milk and ice for a blender bash. Top it off with sweetened whipped cream and mocha drizzle for a real party in your mouth.

menu_items.name: Matcha Green Tea Creme Frappuccino
menu_items.description: We blend sweetened premium matcha green tea, milk and ice and top it with sweetened whipped cream to give you a delicious boost of energy.

menu_items.name: White Chocolate Creme Frappuccino
menu_items.description: A smooth blend of white chocolate sauce, milk and ice and topped with whipped cream for a flavor that wows.

menu_items.name: Chai Creme Frappuccino
menu_items.description: A creamy blend of spicy chai, milk and ice is finished with sweetened whipped cream and a sprinkle of cinnamon. Spice up your afternoon treat.

menu_items.name: Strawberry Frappuccino Blended Beverage Creme
menu_items.description: Summer's favorite berry is the star of this delicious frappuccino blended beverage. A blend of ice, milk and strawberry puree is layered on top of a splash of strawberry puree and finished with vanilla whipped cream.

menu_items.name: Caffe Americano
menu_items.description: Espresso shots are topped with hot water to produce a light layer of crema. The result is this wonderfully rich cup with depth and nuance.

menu_items.name: Starbucks Blonde Caffe Americano
menu_items.description: Espresso shots are topped with hot water to produce a light layer of crema. This version is made with our blonde Roast for a cup that is extra smooth, subtly sweet and nuanced.

menu_items.name: Blonde Roast
menu_items.description: Lightly roasted coffee that's soft, mellow and flavorful. Easy-drinking on its own and delicious with milk, sugar or flavored with vanilla, caramel or hazelnut.

menu_items.name: Caffe Misto
menu_items.description: A one-to-one mix of fresh brewed coffee and steamed milk add up to one distinctly delicious coffee drink.

menu_items.name: Featured Dark Roast
menu_items.description: This full-bodied dark roast coffee has the bold, robust flavors to showcase our roasting and blending artistry.

menu_items.name: Pike Place Roast

menu_items.name: Decaf Pike Place Roast
menu_items.description: Our signature medium-roasted with a smooth, balanced and rich flavor, this is the perfect everyday coffee in a cup.

menu_items.name: Cappuccino
menu_items.description: Dark, rich espresso lies in wait under a smoothed and stretched layer of thick foam. It's truly the height of our baristas craft.

menu_items.name: Starbucks Blonde Cappuccino
menu_items.description: Our seriously smooth and subtly sweet starbucks blonde espresso lies in wait under a smoothed and stretched layer of thick foam. With less milk than a latte, a cappuccino offers a stronger espresso flavor, a luxurious texture and a velvety, frothy foam with a crisp and cool undercurrent.

menu_items.name: Espresso
menu_items.description: Our smooth signature Espresso Roast with rich flavor and caramelly sweetness is at the very heart of everything we do.

menu_items.name: Espresso Con Panna
menu_items.description: Espresso meets a dollop of whipped cream to enhance the rich and caramelly flavors of a straight-up shot.

menu_items.name: Flat White
menu_items.description: Bold ristretto shots of espresso get the perfect amount of steamed whole milk to create a not too strong, not too creamy, just right flavor.

menu_items.name: Starbucks Blonde Flat White
menu_items.description: Ristretto shots of starbucks blonde espresso which is subtly smooth without the roasty edge--get the perfect amount of whole milk, creating a cup that's not too strong, not too creamy, but just right.

menu_items.name: Caffe Latte
menu_items.description: Our dark, rich espresso balanced with steamed milk and a light layer of foam. A perfect milk forward warm up.

menu_items.name: Cinnamon Dolce Latte
menu_items.description: We add freshly steamed milk and cinnamon dolce flavored syrup to our classic espresso, then top it off with sweetened whipped cream and cinnamon dolce topping. You're in for a treat.

menu_items.name: Skinny Cinnamon Dolce Latte
menu_items.description: Espresso, steamed non-fat milk and sugar-free cinnamon dolce flavored syrup. Get a cinnamon dolce topping for a drink that says you can have it all.

menu_items.name: Starbucks Blonde Caffe Latte
menu_items.description: Our seriously smooth and subtly sweet starbucks blonde espresso is balanced with steamed milk and a light layer of foam.

menu_items.name: Starbucks Blonde Vanilla Latte
menu_items.description: Our starbucks blonde espresso, which is seriously smooth and subtly sweet, meets steamed milk and vanilla syrup, creating a delightful twist on a beloved espresso classic.

menu_items.name: Vanilla Bean Coconutmilk Latte
menu_items.description: Flavor-rich, this latte is made with real vanilla bean powder, frothed coconutmilk, then topped with our signature espresso. Some call it an upside down latte, we call it incredible.

menu_items.name: Starbucks Blonde Vanilla Bean Coconutmilk Latte
menu_items.description: This flavor-rich latte is made with real vanilla bean powder, frothed coconutmilk and topped with our subtly-smooth starbucks blonde espresso. Some call it an upside down latte, we call it incredible.

menu_items.name: Espresso Macchiato
menu_items.description: Our rich espresso marked with dollop of steamed milk and foam. A European-style classic.

menu_items.name: Latte Macchiato
menu_items.description: This espresso classic has espresso shots slowly poured over lightly aerated milk for a bold and roasty new way to sip.

menu_items.name: Cinnamon Almondmilk Macchiato
menu_items.description: Our Horchata-inspired macchiato is made with our bold Espresso Roast, creamy almond milk and sweet cinnamon dolce.

menu_items.name: Coconutmilk Mocha Macchiato
menu_items.description: Sumatran coconut milk, white chocolate mocha, and Espresso roast combined with caramel drizzle and a swirl of mocha to create five perfectly-balanced layers of espresso sweetness in every sip.

menu_items.name: Caramel Macchiato
menu_items.description: Freshly steamed milk with vanilla-flavored syrup is marked with espresso and topped with caramel drizzle for an oh-so-sweet finish.

menu_items.name: Caramel Cloud Macchiato
menu_items.description: Our cloud macchiato is light and airy with layers of fluffy foam, cascading espresso, vanilla-flavored syrup and a drizzle of caramel. It's a whole new way to love your macchiato. Contains egg.

menu_items.name: Cinnamon Cloud Macchiato
menu_items.description: Our cloud macchiato is light and airy with layers of fluffy foam, cascading espresso, cinnamon flavored syrup, a caramel drizzle and a dusting of cinnamon. It's a whole new way to love your macchiato. Contains egg.

menu_items.name: Starbucks Blonde Caramel Cloud Macchiato
menu_items.description: Our cloud macchiato is light and airy with layers of fluffy foam, cascading starbucks blonde espresso, vanilla-flavored syrup and a drizzle of caramel. It's a whole new way to love your macchiato. Contains egg.

menu_items.name: Starbucks Blonde Cinnamon Cloud Macchiato
menu_items.description: Our cloud macchiato is light and airy with layers of fluffy foam, cascading starbucks blonde espresso, cinnamon flavored syrup, a caramel drizzle and a dusting of cinnamon. It's a whole new way to love your macchiato. Contains egg.

menu_items.name: Caffe Mocha

menu_items.name: Skinny Mocha

menu_items.name: White Chocolate Mocha
menu_items.description: Our signature espresso meets white chocolate sauce and steamed milk, then is finished off with sweetened whipped cream in this white chocolate delight.

menu_items.name: Cordusio
menu_items.description: Inspired by the vibrant culture of the piazza cordusio, home of the newest starbucks reserve roastery. This beverage is our most espresso-forward mocha. With an extra shot of rich espresso, creamy whole milk and a hint of mocha, combine to create a rich, bitter sweet mocha, reminiscent of dark chocolate.

menu_items.name: Coffee Traveler - Blonde Roast
menu_items.description: A convenient carrier filled with 96 fl. oz. of our veranda blend blonde roast brewed coffee (equivalent of twelve 8-ounce cups) that's great for meetings, picnics or whatever occasion calls for coffee.

menu_items.name: Coffee Traveler - Pike Place Roast
menu_items.description: A convenient carrier filled with 96 fl. oz. of our featured medium roast brewed coffee (equivalent of twelve 8-ounce cups) that's great for meetings, picnics or whatever occasion calls for coffee.

menu_items.name: Coffee Traveler - Decaf Pike Place Roast
menu_items.description: A convenient carrier filled with 96 fl. oz. of our featured decaf brewed coffee (equivalent of twelve 8-ounce cups) that's great for meetings, picnics or whatever occasion calls for coffee.

menu_items.name: Coffee Traveler - Dark Roast
menu_items.description: A convenient carrier filled with 96 fl. oz. of our featured dark roast brewed coffee (equivalent of twelve 8-ounce cups) that's great for meetings, picnics or whatever occasion calls for coffee.

menu_items.name: Teavana Chai Tea
menu_items.description: Black tea infused with warm clove, cardamom, cinnamon & ginger notes.

menu_items.name: Chai Latte
menu_items.description: Black tea infused with cinnamon, clove, and other warming spices is combined with steamed milk and topped with foam for the perfect balance of sweet and spicy.

menu_items.name: Royal English Breakfast Black Tea
menu_items.description: Each sip of this beloved morning black tea unfolds to reveal the complexity of the high grown full leaves. An elegant, time-honored classic that brings a royal nod to every cup.

menu_items.name: London Fog Tea Latte
menu_items.description: Bright, citrusy spark of Italian bergamot blends with subtle hints of lavender, vanilla syrup, and steamed milk for this frothy reinvention of classic Earl Grey tea.

menu_items.name: Earl Grey Black Tea
menu_items.description: We take a strong black tea base and add the essence of bergamot, a citrus fruit with subtle lemon and floral lavender notes, to create this aromatically awesome tea flavor.

menu_items.name: Emperor's Cloud and Mist Green Tea
menu_items.description: This gently smoky, softly sweet green tea is cultivated at 3,500 feet, shrouded in ethereal clouds and mist. It's tasty no matter what language you say it in.

menu_items.name: Matcha Green Tea Latte
menu_items.description: Smooth and creamy matcha is lightly sweetened and served with steamed milk.

menu_items.name: Honey Citrus Mint Tea
menu_items.description: A customer creation so popular it's now on the menu. Jade Citrus Mint green tea, Peach Tranquility herbal tea, hot water, steamed lemonade and a touch of honey mingle tastefully well together for a tea that comforts from the inside out.

menu_items.name: Jade Citrus Mint Brewed Tea
menu_items.description: Chun mee green tea, lemon verbena, lemongrass and a hint of spearmint mingle for a bright, refreshing, citrusy green tea experience.

menu_items.name: Peach Tranquility Herbal Tea
menu_items.description: A sweet fusion of candied peach, pineapple, chamomile blossoms, lemon verbena, and rose hips come together in this caffeine free herbal tea. Sip back and relax.

menu_items.name: Mint Majesty Herbal Tea
menu_items.description: A blend of mint and a pinch of lemon verbena creates a refreshing flavor that's super cool for a caffeine free herbal tea.

menu_items.name: Comfort Wellness Brewed Tea
menu_items.description: Balance your being with our herbal infusion crafted with lemon, ginger, fennel, licorice root and soothing mint.

menu_items.name: Citrus Defender
menu_items.description: Power through the winter season with our vitamin C packed Defense white tea, handcrafted with steamed lemonade and honey.

menu_items.name: Defense Wellness Brewed Tea
menu_items.description: Put your guard up with the vitamin C found in this revitalizing blend of white tea, which includes notes of uplifting citrus and lemongrass.

menu_items.name: White Hot Chocolate
menu_items.description: A traditional hot chocolate beverage made with white chocolate and steamed milk topped with whipped cream.

menu_items.name: Skinny Hot Chocolate
menu_items.description: Bittersweet skinny mocha sauce and steamed non-fat milk are lightly topped with foam. Sip on the lighter side of sweet.

menu_items.name: Hot Chocolate
menu_items.description: Steamed milk with vanilla - and mocha - flavored syrups. topped with sweetened whipped cream and chocolate-flavored drizzle.

menu_items.name: Caramel Apple Spice
menu_items.description: Steamed apple juice complemented with cinnamon syrup, whipped cream and caramel sauce drizzle.

menu_items.name: Steamed Apple Juice
menu_items.description: Freshly steamed, 100% pressed apple juice.

menu_items.name: Cinnamon Dolce Creme
menu_items.description: We combine freshly steamed milk and cinnamon dolce flavored syrup, then top it off with sweetened whipped cream and cinnamon dolce topping. Your in for a treat.

menu_items.name: Vanilla Creme
menu_items.description: A smooth, frothy vanilla flavored luxury. For those times when you'd rather not indulge in the rich flavor of our world-famous espresso - but still desire a hot, creamy vanilla beverage.

menu_items.name: Steamed Milk
menu_items.description: A warm cup of skim, 2% soy or coconut milk is steamed for your sipping pleasure.

menu_items.name: Starbucks Cold Brew Coffee with Milk
menu_items.description: Our custom blend of beans are grown to steep long and cold for a super-smooth flavor. Starbucks cold brew is handcrafted in small batches daily, slow-steeped in cool water for 20 hours, without touching heat and finished with a splash of milk.

menu_items.name: Starbucks Cold Brew Coffee
menu_items.description: Our custom blend of beans are grown to steep long and cold for a super-smooth flavor. Starbucks cold brew is handcrafted in small batches daily, slow-steeped in cool water for 20 hours, without touching heat.

menu_items.name: Vanilla Sweet Cream Cold Brew
menu_items.description: Just before serving, our slow-steeped custom blend starbucks cold brew coffee is topped with a delicate float of house-made vanilla sweet cream that cascades throughout the cup.

menu_items.name: Cold Brew with Cold Foam
menu_items.description: Kickstart your morning or power through the afternoon with our bold, smooth cold brew that's topped with cold foam.

menu_items.name: Cold Brew with Salted Cream Cold Foam
menu_items.description: Here's a savory-meets-sweet refreshing beverage certain to delight. our signature, super smooth Cold Brew, sweetened with a touch of caramel and topped with a salted, rich cold foam.

menu_items.name: Cold Brew with Cascara Cold Foam
menu_items.description: Here's a savory-meets-sweet refreshing beverage certain to delight. Our signature, super smooth cold Brew, sweetened with a touch of caramel and topped with a salted, rich cold foam.

menu_items.name: Iced Caffe Americano
menu_items.description: Espresso shots are topped with cold water to produce a light layer of crema then served over ice. The result is this wonderfully rich cup with depth and nuance.

menu_items.name: Iced Starbucks Blonde Caffe Americano
menu_items.description: Espresso shots are topped with water to produce a light layer of crema then served over ice. This version is made with our blonde espresso for a cup that is extra smooth, subtly sweet and nuanced.

menu_items.name: Iced Cappuccino with Cold Foam
menu_items.description: Our starbucks signature espresso lies in wait under a smooth layer of frothed cold foam. With just a splash of milk, an iced cappuccino offers a balanced cup with a stronger espresso flavor and a velvety, frothy foam with a crisp, cool undercurrent.

menu_items.name: Iced Coffee
menu_items.description: Freshly brewed starbucks iced coffee blend served chilled and lightly sweetened over ice.

menu_items.name: Iced Coffee with Milk
menu_items.description: Freshly brewed starbucks Iced coffee blend with milk ? served chilled and lightly sweetened over ice.

menu_items.name: Starbucks Doubleshot on Ice
menu_items.description: Made with the rich, full-bodied espresso you love that's been chilled and mellowed with a touch of milk and lightly sweetened this drink is delightfully convenient.

menu_items.name: Iced Espresso
menu_items.description: Our smooth signature espresso roast over ice boasts rich flavor and caramelly sweetness and is at the very heart of everything we do.

menu_items.name: Starbucks Blonde Doubleshot On Ice
menu_items.description: Smooth and subtly sweet shots of starbucks blonde espresso are shaken with our classic syrup and ice, then topped with a splash of milk for a creamy finish.

menu_items.name: Iced Flat Whites
menu_items.description: Bold ristretto shots of espresso get the perfect amount of whole milk and ice to create a not too strong, not too creamy, just right flavor.

menu_items.name: Iced Caffe Latte

menu_items.name: Iced Cinnamon Dolce Latte

menu_items.name: Iced Starbucks Blonde Cinnamon Cloud Macchiato
menu_items.description: Our cloud macciato is light and airy with layers of fluffy foam, cascading starbucks blonde espresso, cinnamon flavored syrup, a caramel drizzle and a dusting of cinnamon served over ice. It's a whole new way to love your Macchiato.

menu_items.name: Iced Starbucks Blonde Caramel Cloud Macchiato
menu_items.description: Our cloud macchiato is light and airy with layers of fluffy foam, cascading starbucks blonde espresso, vanilla-flavored syrup and a drizzle of caramel served over ice. It's a whole new way to love your Macchiato. Contains egg.
